title: ConditionDefinition
description: Schema for a status condition a character can be under.

id.description: Unique identifier for this condition definition.

description.description: A general description of the condition.

appliedEffects.description: Mechanical effects this condition imposes. Each item is an EffectDefinition ID or an embedded EffectDefinition object.

immunityGranting.description: Describes what other conditions or types of effects this condition might make the character immune to.

items.description: targetCategory from EffectDefinition or a specific effect ID.

removalTriggers.description: Specific events or actions that can remove this condition.

source.description: Where this condition is typically defined (e.g., 'Core Rules').
